body.p: Message Invalid character found in the request target [/ebisearch/ws/rest/biosamples?query="Nocardia%20asteroides"%20OR%20"Nocardia%20brasiliensis"%20OR%20"Nocardia%20farcinica"%20OR%20"Nocardia%20nova"%20OR%20"Nocardia%20otitidiscaviarum"%20OR%20"Orientia%20tsutsugamushi"%20OR%20"Pasteurella%20multocida"%20OR%20"Pasteurella%20spp"%20OR%20"Peptostreptococcus%20anaerobius"%20OR%20"Peptostreptococcus%20spp"%20OR%20"Plesiomonas%20shigelloides"%20OR%20"Porphyromonas%20spp"%20OR%20"Prevotella%20spp"%20OR%20"Proteus%20mirabilis"%20OR%20"Proteus%20penneri"%20OR%20"Proteus%20vulgaris"%20OR%20"Providencia%20alcalifaciens"%20OR%20"Providencia%20rettgeri"%20OR%20"Providencia%20spp"%20OR%20"Pseudomonas%20aeruginosa"%20OR%20"Rhodococcus%20equi"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20akari"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20canadensis"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20conorii"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20montanensis"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20prowazekii"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20rickettsii"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20spp"%20OR%20"Rickettsia%20typhi"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20enterica%20arizonae"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20enterica%20serovar%20enteritidis"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20enterica%20serovar%20typhimurium"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20enterica%20paratyphi%20A"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20enterica%20paratyphi%20B"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20enterica%20paratyphi%20C"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20spp"%20OR%20"Salmonella%20enterica%20typhi"%20OR%20"Shigella%20boydii"%20OR%20"Shigella%20dysenteriae"%20OR%20"Shigella%20dysenteriae"%20OR%20"Shigella%20flexneri"%20OR%20"Shigella%20sonnei"%20OR%20"Staphylococcus%20aureus"%20OR%20"Streptobacillus%20moniliformis"%20OR%20"Streptococcus%20agalactiae"%20OR%20"Streptococcus%20dysgalactiae%20subsp.%20equisimilis"%20OR%20"Streptococcus%20pneumoniae"%20OR%20"Streptococcus%20pyogenes"%20OR%20"Streptococcus%20spp"%20OR%20"Streptococcus%20suis"%20OR%20"Treponema%20pallidum"%20OR%20"Treponema%20pertenue"%20OR%20"Treponema%20spp"%20OR%20"Trueperella%20pyogenes"%20OR%20"Ureaplasma%20parvum"%20OR%20"Ureaplasma%20urealyticum"%20OR%20"Vibrio%20cholerae"%20OR%20"Vibrio%20parahaemolyticus"%20OR%20"Vibrio%20spp" ]. The valid characters are defined in RFC 7230 and RFC 3986

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).
